column1: Table 6-16:  Non-CO2 Emissions from Forest Fires (kt) a

column2: a These estimates include Non-CO2 Emissions from Forest Fires on Forest Land Remaining Forest Land and Land Converted to Forest Land.
b Some fire data for 2018 and all of 2019 were unavailable when these estimates were summarized; therefore 2017 or 2018, the most recent available estimate, is applied to 2019.
